title: Trend in GDP growth from chart in Iran

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes a trend in the data?

choices.label: The GDP growth rate increased consistently between 2007 and 2017.
The GDP growth rate fluctuated between 2007 and 2017.
There was no GDP growth between 2007 and 2014, then steep positive growth between 2014 and 2017.
The GDP growth rate was positive between 2007 and 2010, then it was negative between 2015 and 2017.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
